'''The Steward of Gondor''' is the fifth track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]]. It features [[Billy Boyd]] singing a brief song that has lyrics based off of the final two stanzas of [[A Walking Song]].

==Lyrics==
<poem>
Home is behind,
The world ahead.
And there are many paths to tread
through shadow, to the edge of night,
until the stars are all alight.
Mist and shadow.
Cloud and shade. 
All shall fade.
All shall fade.
</poem>
{{DEFAULTSORT:05}}
